data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Cruz-López, Jesús A. (2017): A second species of the genus Martensolasma (Opiliones, Dyspnoi, Nemastomatidae) from Mexico. Zootaxa 4338 (3), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4338.3.7|4 occurrences
